sentences.en: Her past life was miserable.
sentences.cn: 她过去的生活很苦.

sentences.en: I spent a miserable weekend alone at home.
sentences.cn: 我独自一人在家度过了一个惨兮兮的周末。

sentences.en: I spent the weekend feeling miserable .
sentences.cn: 我那个周末心情很糟糕。

sentences.en: I’ve been so miserable since Pat left me.
sentences.cn: 自从帕特离我而去后，我十分痛苦。

sentences.en: It was a grey, wet, miserable day.
sentences.cn: 那是阴郁灰暗、潮湿多雨的一天。

sentences.en: It was miserable of you to make fun of him.
sentences.cn: 你取笑他,这是可耻的.

sentences.en: It was very cold, damp and miserable.
sentences.cn: 天气非常寒冷潮湿，令人难受。

sentences.en: Jan looks really miserable .
sentences.cn: 简看上去很痛苦。

sentences.en: Miserable, and unexpectedly lonely, she went in search of Jean-Paul.
sentences.cn: 内心痛苦、突感寂寞的她去寻找琼－保罗。

sentences.en: Mosquito bites can make life miserable .
sentences.cn: 蚊子叮咬会让人很难受。

sentences.en: Our speed over the ground was a miserable 2.2 knots.
sentences.cn: 我们在接近地面时的航速仅为2.2节。

sentences.en: She looked rather strained and miserable.
sentences.cn: 她看起来紧张而痛苦.

sentences.en: She turned pale at the sight of the miserable condition.
sentences.cn: 她一看到这惨状就面容失色.

sentences.en: Sheila was looking miserable.
sentences.cn: 希拉看上去愁眉苦脸的。

sentences.en: The final two months were a miserable coda to the President's first period in office.
sentences.cn: 总统首届任期的最后两个月非常糟糕。

sentences.en: They ended by making themselves miserable.
sentences.cn: 结果是他们自找苦头。

sentences.en: They endured hours of backbreaking work in miserable conditions.
sentences.cn: 他们在恶劣条件下忍受长时间的繁重劳动。

sentences.en: They started their holiday on a miserable day.
sentences.cn: 他们假期开始时天气很不好.

sentences.en: We have led a miserable life.
sentences.cn: 我们过了一段悲惨的生活.

sentences.en: We were cold, wet and thoroughly miserable.
sentences.cn: 我们又冷又湿，难受极了。

sentences.en: What a miserable old devil he was!
sentences.cn: 他是多么可恶的吝啬鬼呀!

sentences.en: Why do you make yourself miserable by taking on too much work?
sentences.cn: 你为什么揽这么多活儿，把自己弄得很辛苦呢？

words.tran_cn: 贫困地；可悲地；糟糕地；非常不幸地

trans.tran_cn: 悲惨的，令人痛苦的，太少的，卑鄙的
trans.tran_en: extremely unhappy, for example because you feel lonely, cold, or badly treated
